00056 class BIndexedDataNode : public BMetaDataNode, public BIndexedIterable, public SDatumGeneratorInt

00066     virtual                         ~BIndexedDataNode();

00068

00077 
00079 
00080     // --------------------------------------------------------------
00084

00095
